note.p: Surgeon-apothecary. Trained in London with the surgeon Henry Cline. Eloped with Lady Lucy Rachael Stanhope (1780–1814), youngest daughter of Charles Stanhope, third Earl Stanhope, in 1796. Appointed comptroller of the Customs by William Pitt the younger, his wife’s uncle. Father of John Pitt Taylor.
